name: Khnocka Dorra - Knocka Dora 2
description:
Khnocka Dorra - Knocka Dora 2 is the second part to a game I made

in 2015. Khnocka Dorra - Knocka Dora 2 is a horror-adventure with action-RPG

elements where you solve puzzles.
Graphics, music & story is self-made. Although I used bases alot for the graphics.

Character portraits & some images were made using an AI (Artbreeder).

Deep in the Louisiana woods, ghosts gather around miser Vanderdekken's mansion.
With his cult of like-minded people he tries to conjure up the spirits of the country in the service of despicable Mammon. They brought back three of the worst people in history to aid them: Wallenstein, Generalissimo of the great European War, Moctezuma II., the heartless Aztec emperor & Roche Braziliano, one of the most atrocious pirates to ever scurge the seas.
Damnation descends on the walls & holds hosts, visitors & their servants captive.
Doreen must find a way out of the mansion.

Features:

* Fight three historical characters as ghosts

* Storytelling seems like you are talking to a mentally ill person

* Dark, distorted soundtrack; but also some sweet Folk melodies

* Runtime of ca. 2 hours

* Challenging difficulty

* Restricted healing-system

* Tragic lore

* House & curse change over time
